  • Method Details

    • act

      public abstract void act​(List<Animal> newAnimals)
      Lets the animal act, abstract so that each animal can act in a different way if it wants

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Check whether the rabbit is alive or not.
      Returns:
      true if the rabbit is still alive.

    • setDead

      protected void setDead()
      Indicate that the rabbit is no longer alive. It is removed from the field.

    • getLocation

      public Location getLocation()
      Return the rabbit's location.
      Returns:
      The rabbit's location.

    • setLocation

      protected void setLocation​(Location newLocation)
      Place the rabbit at the new location in the given field.
      Parameters:
      newLocation - The rabbit's new location.

    • breed

      protected int breed()
      Generate a number representing the number of births, if it can breed.
      Returns:
      The number of births (may be zero).
